SEARCH
程序包 com.hsmkmathlib.tools

类 ArrayTools

java.lang.Object
com.hsmkmathlib.tools.ArrayTools
public final class ArrayTools extends Object
A utility class that provides static methods for working with arrays or 2D arrays.

Such as

- Convert an array or 2D array to a string

- Check if an array is sorted

- Reverse an array

- Converts an array or 2D array of base types to an array or 2D array of its wrapping classes

- Converts an array or 2D array of wrapping classes to an array or 2D array of its base types

- Concatenate two arrays or 2D arrays

- Copy an array or 2D array

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    static final int
    ASCENDING
    Constant representing ascending order.
    static final int
    DESCENDING
    Constant representing descending order.

  • 方法详细资料

    • arrayToString

      public static String arrayToString(Object[] array, CharSequence delimiter, CharSequence prefix, CharSequence suffix)
      Converts an array of objects into a string with specified delimiter, prefix, and suffix.
      参数:
      array - the array of objects to be converted into a string
      delimiter - the sequence of characters to separate each element
      prefix - the sequence of characters to be added at the beginning of the resulting string
      suffix - the sequence of characters to be added at the end of the resulting string
      返回:
      a string representation of the array with elements separated by the specified delimiter and enclosed in the specified prefix and suffix, or null if the array is null

    • arrayToString

      public static String arrayToString(Object[] array)
      Converts an array of objects into a string with the elements separated by commas, enclosed in square brackets. calls arrayToString(Object[], CharSequence, CharSequence, CharSequence)
      参数:
      array - the array of objects to be converted into a string
      返回:
      a string representation of the array with elements separated by commas(`,`) and enclosed(`[` and `]`) in square brackets, or null if the array is null

    • arrayToString

      public static String arrayToString(Object[][] array)

    • arrayToString

      参数:
      array - the array of objects to be converted into a string
      delimiter - the sequence of characters to separate each element
      返回:
      a string representation of the array with elements separated by the specified delimiter and enclosed(`[` and `]`), or null if the array is null

      a string representation of the array with elements separated by the specified delimiter and enclosed in square brackets, or null if the array is null

    • isSorted

      public static <T extends Comparable<T>> boolean isSorted(T[] array, int start, int end, int aix)
      Checks if the given array is sorted within the specified range and axis.

      This method verifies whether the elements in the specified range of the array are sorted in either ascending or descending order, based on the axis value. It throws an IllegalArgumentException if the array is null, if the start or end indices are invalid, or if the axis value is neither ASCENDING nor DESCENDING.

      参数:
      array - the array to be checked
      start - the starting index of the check range
      end - the ending index of the check range
      aix - the axis value for the sorting order, either ASCENDING or DESCENDING
      返回:
      true if the array is sorted within the specified range and axis, false otherwise
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the array is null, the start or end index is invalid, or the axis value is invalid

    • isSorted

      public static <T extends Comparable<T>> boolean isSorted(T[] array) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Checks if the given array is sorted in ascending order.

      This method verifies whether the elements in the array are sorted in ascending order. It throws an IllegalArgumentException if the array is null.

      类型参数:
      T - The type of array, must implement Comparable
      参数:
      array - the array to be checked
      返回:
      true if the array is sorted in ascending order, false otherwise
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the array is null

      public static double[] concatenateArray(double[] a, double[] b)
      Concatenates two arrays into one.

      This method takes two arrays as input and returns a new array containing all the elements of the two arrays. It throws an IllegalArgumentException if either of the input arrays is null.

      参数:
      a - the first array to be concatenated
      b - the second array to be concatenated
      返回:
      a new array containing all the elements of the two arrays
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either of the arrays is null

    • concatenateArray

      public static boolean[][] concatenateArray(boolean[][] a, boolean[][] b)
      Concatenates two 2D arrays into one.

      This method takes two 2D arrays as input and returns a new 2D array containing all the elements of the two arrays. It throws an IllegalArgumentException if either of the input arrays is null.

      参数:
      a - the first 2D array to be concatenated
      b - the second 2D array to be concatenated
      返回:
      a new 2D array containing all the elements of the two arrays
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either of the arrays is null

    • concatenateArray

    • pacakageArray

      public static Double[][] pacakageArray(double[][] array)
      Converts a 2D array of double to a 2D array of its wrapping class Double.

      This method takes a 2D array of double as an argument and returns a new 2D array containing the equivalent Double values. It throws an IllegalArgumentException if the array is null.

      参数:
      array - the 2D array of double to be converted
      返回:
      a new 2D array containing the equivalent Double values
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the array is null

    • copyArray

      public static double[][] copyArray(double[][] array)
      Creates a deep copy of a two-dimensional double array.
      参数:
      array - The source two-dimensional double array to be copied
      返回:
      A new two-dimensional double array containing the same values as the input array, or null if the input array is null
